value:
The walls of a sandcastle may
stand for but a moment...but the
memory will remain forever...

Normally, I do not venture beyond
the dream realm...but the whimsy of
summer ought not to be passed up.

The dazzling array of chilled treats is
sure to please Peony and Mirabilis...

Freyja and Plumeria have joined us,
have they? ...This dream must be
a good dream for them as well.

This is the first time I've worn a suit
meant for swimming, but it is a rather
pleasant way to relax...

I am Dream-King Freyr. I have been
asked to give you a good summer's
dream from $Nf.

Dreams dreamt under the light of the
sun's brilliance are even more radiant
than I had expected...

The ocean's roar crashes against
my heart, weathering it smooth...

The heat seems to have gotten
to me...

This dream of yours will grow into
summer love's eternal flame.

I am Dream-King of Ljósálfheimr,
Freyr... Summer is the season to
spread pleasant dreams to all...

Long, long ago...I dreamt of a summer
day spent beneath the sun's rays...$k$pAnd you were standing beside me in
that dream, $Nu...$k$pThere is no mistake.$k$pThat was a true dream... It was
a promise made by the future.$k$pHow will the dream continue from
here, I wonder... Of course, knowing
would detract from the mystique.$k$pDreams form our desires and shape
the future...but for now, let us simply
drift off into the summer sun.
たあっ
これで
ああっ
これほどとは…
By the sea's beauty.
Revel in the waves!
A summer's dream...
Let us remember this…
Too much revelry...?
Chuckle...
Thank you for inviting me here... I hope we can enjoy this time together.
Hmm...? Ah, no, I am not sleeping... Simply enjoying the sunlight's caress...
I have seen this beach before... In a dream... It must have been a dream of this moment...
I wish Peony and Mirabilis could join me here...
Dreams can occur even in full sunlight... Just look around you.
How long has it been since you were so untroubled, Freyja...
The time I've spent here... It has been dreamlike. Thank you.
Indeed?
Quite so...
To the waves.
